Package controller

Class PortfolioControllerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.PortfolioControllerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PortfolioController
    public class PortfolioControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PortfolioController
    Class that controls the portfolios and that implements the functions in portfolio controller.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor Description
      PortfolioControllerImpl​(PortfolioImpl portfolioImpl, PortfolioViewImpl portfolioViewImpl)
      Constructor that takes model and view as the input as parameters and initializes the model and view.

      Constructor that takes model,stock model and view as parameters and initializes them.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      PortfolioImpl addStock()
      Method that is used to map the stocks to the model using a hashmap.Also tells the user that the stock was added successfully, it is currently in draft.
      PortfolioImpl afterAddingStock​(PortfolioImpl model)
      Method that takes a confirmation from the user and saves the stocks into the portfolio.It also provides an option for the user to add a new stock after adding one and saving it.
      void controllerToViewHelper​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​StocksImpl> portfolioEntries)
      Method used to format the view of a portfolio.
      void viewSpeculate​(java.lang.String input, ListOfStocksImpl listOfStocksImpl)
      Method used to ask the user if he wants to speculate and perform speculation on the selected portfolio.
      boolean viewSpeculateHelper​(java.lang.String fileName, ListOfStocksImpl listOfStocksImpl)
      Method to perform speculation operation on the portfolio.

        public PortfolioImpl afterAddingStock​(PortfolioImpl model)
                               throws java.io.IOException

        Returns:
        model after updating the stock.
